manifesto.intro.text: We are not here to configure tools.
But to bring order and philosophy back to growth.
The market turned RevOps into a maze of jargon, decorative automations, and ever heavier, fragmented stacks.
Very few know how to think it and structure it.

manifesto.statement.text: At Ocobo, we reject confusion, noise, and technological mirages.
To us, RevOps is not a technical job.
It is a strategic discipline: the architecture of your revenue.

manifesto.actions.text: Simplify processes all the way to usage, down to the bone if needed.
Make data reliable, readable, and actionable.

manifesto.clarity.text: We exist to call things by their name,
to bring clarity back in a world of jargon,
and to offer organizations a rare privilege:
the experience of simple, healthy, controlled growth.

manifesto.invitation.title: Ocobo is our invitation
items: to face your revenue machine head-on,
to choose operational truth over performance illusions,

to build your revenue not as a stack,
but as a system designed to last and stay alive.

manifesto.conclusion.text: We believe growth is never an accident.
But the result of a sound architecture, a revenue engine that breathes, and a demand for alignment.
